title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, February 26, 2021
description: The Grand Canyon was called by Teddy Roosevelt, “the one great sight which every American should see.” On this day in 1919 it was designated a National Park.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The Grand Canyon was called by Teddy Roosevelt, “the one great sight which every American should see.” On this day in 1919 it was designated a National Park.
